Articles.Content:
Man Conquers Space Sizzle Reel 2010

This is what amounts to what might have happened if NASA or it\'s equivalent received full funding by the government since the start of the space program. Colonies on the moon, giant rotating permanent stations, and even more.

This is inspiring, and mildly depressing, as it is sad that this history isn\'t the real history, because the government thought NASA wasn\'t worth funding.

Now, watch, think, and discuss below. There are many more teasers on the channel and there is a website if you would like to see the rest of the project.

This is a project by one man to make a movie about an alternate history of space flight. Please consider as you watch that one man directed produced and edited this while still paying his bills, and that it is an unfinished project.
If only we spent a decent amount of money on space... maybe then we\'ll have a chance at surviving here on this earth...
